name: BERLIN ROSEN FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PEW CHARITABLE TRUSTS
description: Non-profit org dedicated to improving public policy and informing the public.
sampleDescriptions: The Pew Charitable Trusts has retained us to lobby in support of the RISEE Act, which would allocated offshore wind revenue to host states.
